institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training project operating rules/Article 13 (Support for improving job skills of dedicated personnel)
contents: Article 13 (Support to improve job skills of dedicated staff) The Corporation may operate education and training courses necessary to improve the job skills of staff in charge of business units. In this case, the business group must allow those in charge of the business to participate in business-related job training courses operated by the corporation.
